tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One year back I was pregnant and was consulting some other doctor and had miscarriage in 5th month and doctor was clueless and said" I don't know how and why it happened , everything was normal etc".Then during my second pregnancy I consulted doctor Rashmi and she is very good at her work.She was able to judge my problem from my very first blood test. My and my husband are lone couple working in Bangalore with whole family at Patna. She was the one who gave confidence and we decided not to go back. She had been an Angel and everything was so easy.  Thanks to her we are proud parents of a wonderful daughter. She took extra care of me and guided everything and also  was able to find reason behind miscarriage and she treated me accordingly.**** ************* * **** ****She is well experienced and knows all kind of complications one can face.May God add many more years to your service as we are forever thankful to you mam üíû

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Rashmi is simply amazing! Her expertise and compassionate care made my entire pregnancy journey a breeze. I am eternally grateful for her support during the delivery. Thanks to her skill and professionalism, I welcomed my baby boy into the world without any complications. She was always available on phone and she even picked up my phone call at 4am in the morning on the day of my surgery since i had a water break early morning and had to rush for emergency c-section. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Rashmi to any expectant mother. She is truly a blessing!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy with PCOD,
review:
We are extremely satisfied with Dr.Rashmi. We have started with our pre-pregnancy consultations and thank god we have started with her. Explanation to issue, resolution for it was given at starting only. Pregnancy journey was very smooth with her guidance and motherly nature. We have delivered a healthy baby from her hands only. It was a different experience. 
Rashmi mam treated as her kids and we are thankful to her.
We will definitely recommend her to all the expecting and desired couples.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted and were under the guidance of Dr. Rashmi Chaudhary for the complete tenure of pregnancy.Dr. is highly experienced to deal with challenges we faced during the complete term.She is just a call away in the need of emergency. Her caring nature for patients is commendable .She promoted for Normal Delivery during the complete course of time.We highly recommend Dr. Rashmi Chaudhary for every future mother to get the best care available in Bangalore under her guidance.We feel very lucky to have her support and guidance throughout the term.Blessed with Baby Girl with normal Delivery üíû.We wish every mother to get such a great doctor with them .We can't thank her enough in words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,Pregnancy Check Up,Instrumental Delivery,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
*** **** ****** * **** **** **** ** ** *****i had a complicated pregnancy and had dengue too but she guided abdominal refered me to a good doctor. My entire pregnancy journey was guided by her then yes i gave birth to an angel.my daughter was born without any complications. She was guiding inch by inch. Due to lil bit of complications i have delivered on 38th week via csection. But whenever i see my daughter I always think what i would have done without dr Rashmi chaudhary.

A big shout out to this wonderful and magical doctor. *** *** ***** ***** ***** ***** ** ******* ******Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She was in a hurry and very rude in her behaviour. Just squeezed the boil in my vulva area with her fingers and didn't even give any antibiotics, only painkiller she gave. And was rushing . And was very very very rude. I constantly told her am alone in this city. And she was not kind. Not motherly. She was irritated with me* *** ************* **** ******* * *** ********** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted to Dr Rashmi Chaudhary for both of my pregnancies.Both my deliveries happened successfully via c section with baby weight being 3.1 kg.She is wonderful doctor and assures everything to go well. She observes every small detail and free you from all worries and concerns that you go through in pregnancy.She has given me greatest gift of my life. Thankyou so much Dr Rashmi! I recommend her to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I totally recommend Dr Rashmi. I know it sounds exaggerated, but she's the God sent angel who gifted me the joy of becoming a mother.this was my second pregnancy. my first pregnancy was in the same hospital, with another doctor but sadly I delivered prematurely first time, and my baby couldn't survive. if only I went to Dr. Rashmi first time also. I was reluctant in writing review because, honestly in my office if any colleague has troubled pregnancy case, you hear her name that go to her, she'll save. she's that good. I met five esteemed doctors before going for Dr Rashmi in my second pregnancy. in addition to giving a level of comfort, we found thoughtfulness and expertise also in her.  it is such a long and important journey that one needs to be connected with the obgyn. she was there throughout, all the time, available. I had this sense of security being around her. I was so scared all the time due to prior loss, but she'd listen to me, weigh out the pros and cons, and make me comfortable. she'd never just shoo off any of my concern. that shows the level of seniority and humbleness she has. I used to go so many times, and she was never irritated with my endless list of queries. I have never seen her fussy, so calm and composed. I was lucky enough to have her as my doctor, I had a normal delivery and I am a mother of a four months old baby girl, all credit to Dr Rashmi really. thanks from the bottom of my heart for being there ma'am, you truly are a gem and a blessing for people like me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited For Pregnancy with PCOD, pre and post pregnancy checkup

We feel lucky to meet Dr. Rashmi, she is an extremely super supportive doctor.
I would recommend Dr. Rashmi to everyone who is looking for a Doctor with a combination of Professionalism, Compassion, Knowledge, Confidence and Strong Work Ethics.
We are blessed with a baby boy. The prenatal and post delivery care was handled by Dr Rashmi at Cloudnine in Bellandur.  I had a normal delivery and she waits for things to take it's course of time normally instead of hurriedly deciding for c section or induced labor or suggesting epidural. She gave good encouragement during delivery to push the baby. she treated me as her own daughter in the labor ward,  Post delivery care was also very good.
Like any other elated new to-be parents we had tons of questions and concerns. Dr Rashmi helped us overcome all our fears and handled us extremely sensitively.
I am extremely satisfied and happy with that I consulted Dr., Rashmi for my first pregnancy. She is an expert and carries a rich experience in her field.
Dr. Rashmi has answered all our queries with lot of patience and was always reachable on phone and watsapp at anytime. She is very gentle in her procedures and has an expert hand. Dr. Rashmi was easily able to make out the problems just by looking at the symptoms. 
We decided to continue with CloudNine for the entire period only because of Dr. Rashmi Choudhary.. Thanks a lot Doctor. I am running out of words and cant thank you enough.. All the best

Doctor is average only ..able to pinpoint the recurrent misscarriage cause ...but not able to treat properly üòï..for sperm high  dfi antioxidant dose should be minimal for 3 month ..but she gave medication for 1 month that did not work well & finally she refer us to some other doctors..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Rashmi gave me prescription without checking my medical history. And I got sick because of it.Instead of Rashmi another junior doctor consulted me. and told to get scanning done. By the time scanning done Rashmi was leaving. she wrote prescription while standing outside her consultation room.*Didn't even ask about my medical history*She gave me OCP pills. **** ******* ******** ******** * *** *****  I have even done septoplasty surgery due to sinus.  With heavy headache, head weight, dizziness, vomiting. I was taken in ambulance to emergency from office because my condition was severe.  Needed 2 bottles of pain killers to subside the pain. I got discharged same day. so didn't get insurance.Spend 3k at cloud nine   6k at emergency.  I lost money over sickness which the doctor caused. ** ****** **** ** ******** ********* *** *** ******* ************* ********* ***** ******* **** ** **** **** ***** ********* *** ***** ** ******* *** ** ********* *** **** ************** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),
review: We conceived naturally and decided to meet Dr. Rashmi Choudhary for our pregnancy journey, and we are glad that we made that decision. I was having a low lying placenta also short cervix issue. Dr. Rashmi made sure everything goes fine and suggested me the best. She was always available over WhatsApp and also over call in case of emergency. I had bleeding episodes twice in my pregnancy period and that too early in the morning but when I called ma'am she picked up the call and guided me what to do even though it was a Sunday. She was supportive, friendly and always suggested me the best. With God's grace I gave birth. She also played a major role in making this possible. Throughout my journey Dr. Rashmi was there with me supporting like a mother.  Me and my entire family wants to thank her from bottom of our heart for giving us our bundle of joy. She is truly a gem of a person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting Dr. Rashmi for two years now and going to her was one of the best decisions I have made. From the minute I saw the two lines to achieving full term she took care of me like a mother in my high risk pregnancy journey. She correctly predicts potential issues and resolves them early.  She has always listened to me patiently, prescribed only necessary tests/scans and addressed all my concerns during every visit. She also understood my feelings as I was very anxious due to several complications and she always has a kind reassuring word. She was always approachable and responded to  messages, kick counts in whatsApp at all times of the day and night even during her vacation.  She is a brilliant medical practitioner and my whole family is grateful and thankful to her for bringing my baby to full term and delivering my princess safely despite several complications throughout nine months. Her motherly care and expertise helped me cross this high risk pregnancy journey successfully.  Will highly recommend her to everyone for a smooth and happy pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ********* ** *** ** *** ****** ************** ** ********** We visited her for pre pregnancy counseling and found her extremely positive,  and under her treatment we conceived the very next cycle.I had cervix shortening issues and risk of premature delivery but only with her guidance  we completed 39 weeks.She answered all our questions with patience and was available over wats and calls during emergency. She doesn't prescribe any unnecessary tests or medications. She made me feel very comfortable throughout pregnancy and treated me like her daughter.On the day of delivery she was on call with the junior doctors and reached the hospital at 4 a.m (within 20mins)She is someone who advocates normal delivery. I had a very short labor and smooth delivery under her.During our stay she ensured proper care ,post delivery consultations were also satisfactory.She isnt just a doctor she is an angel for us ! The entire staff(nursing,housekeeping,pantry) everyone is extremely cooperative and ensures safety of the mother and baby.The only thing which we feel isn't fair was the  consultation charges for the first post delivery checkup for the mother.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was referred to Dr Rashmi for my wife's pregnancy, by my earlier doctor (who was very good but was not conducting deliveries). in the beginning itself we were identified with low papp-a value (the condition inhibits the growth of your child and has possibly of pre-term).  We were anxious through our pregnancy; later around 7th month end, we were also identified with Cholestasis condition (in this condition your baby may pass meconium, and you may never know. baby might swallow it and that may result into anything horrible). Doctor with her finesse hands, with right set of medications, right sets of scans, tests etc helped us complete 39 weeks of pregnancy. We never found her suggesting unnecessary tests, scans even in such stressful conditions. Finally we delivered our baby dauther, our bundle of joy, through C-section (induction for normal delivery didn't work); Although slightly underweight, but perfectly healthy. She has been doing perfectly well ever since her birth. Her growth has been good. thank you Ma'am. You are awesome.regards,Nikita & Ashutosh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I started consulting doctor Rashmi since I was 10 weeks pregnant. She is very kind and approachable for any kind of queries during the consultation. Even we can share the lab-reports and queries to her over email. She always respond on time. She has great knowledge, with her guidance on medications & foods I never felt any pain, fitness issue during and post pregnancy.
I was amazed with my delivery experience. My water broke on 36th week and 6th day. I came to the hospital. after preliminary check-up when it was confirmed I got admitted. Once hospital authority informed her, she started guiding sister's and other gynaecologist about the medications I should be given. She was checking my conditions over call, once in 30 mins to 1 hour. She also came to the hospital on Sunday afternoon, just to see how I am doing. Since water broke was not heavy during morning, doctors waited and induced pain by 2:30am. Sister sand other gynaecologist(who was on duty) were keep on checking my condition and were waiting for the pain.
Finally I delivered the baby at 4:21 am through normal delivery.
Doctor Rashmi came around 4:00am and started delivery procedure around 4:10am.
I did not even feel the labour pain for long.
To the best of my knowledge which is based on the stories I heard from friends & family members, I was lucky enough to get the best treatment during and post pregnancy. I had received the best delivery experience once could expect in Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Cloudnine Bellandur for PCOD problem and was not able to conceive since 6month.We were very lucky that we met Dr.Rashmi Chaudhary and at the first meeting we felt so connected and satisfied with the consultation. 
Before pregnancy, some times I felt so negative and when ever I met her for consultation she always gave me hope to be positive. I trusted on her medication and did all the tests/scan she prescribed. 
After 7month I conceived naturally. She suggested only required medicines and scan, nothing unnecessary.

I never felt that I am going to meet a doctor. She always treated me like her own daughter and I also have a motherly feeling with her. She always responded over call/what's app.
At the time of labor pain, she came early morning for delivery and motivated me to push baby as I was all over exhausted due to pain. And finally blessed with a healthy baby girl through normal delivery.

It is just a few words of what ever I experienced with her. I am 100% satisfied with doctor's ********** professionalism, behaviour, positive attitude and friendly nature. I will recommend all my friends and family members whoever is having any pregnancy issues or need consultation over pregnancy period.

Thankyou so much Rashmi mam,I can't express my feelings through words. I just want to say "If Today I became a mother and can feel motherhood,it is only because of you." Thanks alot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to doctor Rashmi when we were trying for the baby. Before her advice, we changed 4 doctors as I was not able to connect with any. At the first meeting, I felt so connected as she was very motherly. Within 2 months of her advice, I conceived naturally. She gave me thyroid tabloid as this was at the higher end for pregnancy and folic acid as well. After I conceived, she didn't give me any unnecessary medicine and with every scan, if some numbers go up in reports, she always said positively that all is well and gave me proper medication to recover. Throughout my pregnancy, there wasn't a single time when she didn't motivate me for normal delivery. Although sometimes I use to be very negative she was sure that I will be going through normal delivery and I should make my mind for that only. For your concerns, she will calmly listen to your problems and if there is an emergency, she will even be available on her phone. Finally, after completing 9 months, I went into labour for 13hrs and had a normal delivery. When I was going through pains, she was there and motivated me that I can do it and never I felt that I should give up and go for an operation. Make sure you listen to her so that they can follow their procedures and help us only. After delivery also, she gave me the same vitamins to go through for 2 months. My overall experience with her is very good and will suggest her name to all my friends who are planning and will plan for a baby. I am very thankful to her that everything went well at the end and I delivered a healthy baby girl.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I started consulting Dr. Rashmi after I conceived. I had a bad history in past and really wanted to choose my doctor wisely this time. After lot of research I decided to go with Dr Rashmi and this was the best decision I took. She took extra care of me throughout my pregnancy journey and always helped to calm me as I think I was the most anxious patient. She was not only friendly but was always available whenever in need. This gave me immense confidence that if she is there everything will be good. By God's grace and with her support our bundle of joy has arrived in the world. I can't thank her enough and would recommend Dr Rashmi to every pregnant lady ** *** ** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I visited Dr. Rashmi via practo review in the 3rd month of my pregnancy. After hearing my story she took my case on priority. ( had a miscarriage via IVF n then after 2 years of miscarriage conceived naturally.) I am so lucky that I decided to go with Rashmi ma'am. She listened to my problems calmly and explained reasons for them and solutions every single time.  I was high blood pressure patient, I had complications in my journey. Ma'am gave me her number that I can call her any time and she helped me every time immediately. Rashmi ma'am is very friendly with her patients. I had an emergency c- section delivery and she was so caring during the whole procedure. I would like to thank Rashmi ma'am with my deepest heart for making my pregnancy fearless. I will highly recommend Rashmi ma'am. I gave Rashmi ma'am's recommendation in my society also.  Thank you ma'am for your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very nice.. friendly n supportive..She listens to our queries properly and assures us that everything will be fine...I will definitely recommend her to anyone looking for a gynecologist..!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Miracle ChildI have been married 10 years and had no kid,we visit lot of doctors on opinions and nothing worked for us.When i visited Rashmi Mam, she explained the process we were going to to take , i am 33 years by then and i thought natural pregnancy might not be.my option but with Rashmi Mam's experience and guidence i conceived without naturally which was a huge relief within 8 months of treatment,i was pregnant and throughout pregnancy no matter complications everything was handled very well, i had to go on bed rest for 5 months due to cervical stitch and the procedure was seamless .I would like to thank ...Rashmi mam for our miracle child..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr Rashmi Choudhary in Cloudnine Bellandur. And I will never regret this decision in life. *** ** *** ***** Talks on point. Gave me the best guidance and support that was needed throughout the journey. A planned c section turned out to be an emergency c section and she did it perfectly. We were blessed with a healthy daughter. The stitches were so neatly done that I have a hard time finding out where they are actually. The entire healing process was faster. I had an enjoyable pregnancy journey all because of her and my husband and I will be forever grateful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Instrumental Delivery,Pregnancy,
review:
When I got pregnant, I was skeptical about the Doctor whom I should consult and take my whole journey with and after reading the reviews I decided to consult Dr. Rashmi. It was one of the best decisions to go with her. Although I had complications, she never scared me. She is always so understanding and takes care of the fears especially for a first time mother. She will explain the details required for the patient and prescribe the best she can do.
Due to my complications she advised rest in the 3rd trimester and that C sec would be best. We went with her suggestion and we were blessed with our baby all healthy. I would highly recommend her as she doesn‚Äôt unnecessarily scare you, she is too polite and yet firm to deal with pregnant ladies. I had a very seem less journey with her throughout my pregnancy and post pregnancy especially in pandemic era it was blissful.  I might be very late in writing this review but better late than never.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Thanks a ton to Dr.Rashmi for helping with my 2 normal deliveries (one at Apollo cradle and other at cloudnine) giving wonderful daughters :)
She guided, added hope and gave positive feedback to have second pregnancy while I was 38- high risk due to age and having second pregnancy after 8yrs. Doctor made me comfortable during pregnancy visits, helped with online video consultation while I got covid during 2nd trimesters and with normal delivery having her team of nurses and junior doctor telling I am her old patient :). Although I wished for normal delivery, I never insisted/enforced on her like must have. Doctor wanted me to have normal and  said she wants me to have same and will try the same asking me to keep open mind as at delivery time any complications could occur. She is very responsive on whatsapp to help with my queries and review reports over phone. I will recommend her 100% for any pregnancy cases. Thank you again, doctor to enjoy motherhood second time!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted Doctor Rashmi Chaudhary at Cloudnine Hospital bellandur for my first pregnancy. She treated my all the health issues and explained me everything. When I consulted I was suffering with Covid. She gave me only 3 days medicine and I recovered. During my third trimester I had several complications like fatty lever, baby weight was more and also extreme low platelets count. Though it was very difficult to go for normal delivery but she gave a try because I wanted. Due to complications I had C-section. Right  now me and baby are doing well.. all the credit goes to her. She will not ask for unnecessary tests. *** ** *** **** *************.. I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was under Dr Rashmi Chaudhary‚Äôs supervision during my entire pregnancy term and post delivery and I would like to highly recommend her. She took all necessary care and precautions with my case - given I had thyroid and high sugar level. Delivery and post delivery recovery was also very smooth. Given our first baby we had lot of anxiety and questions but She explained everything very well and made entire process simple and easy for us. Our decision of going with cloudnine and especially with Dr Rashmi was correct and we thank them for a good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** * **** **** ********** I was under her treatment for close to 1.5 years before I conceived, in which I miscarriaged once , during that she took care of me like her own child. Then when I conceived again in feb 2021 , she took all the necessary precautions ( whether its meds or scans) from day 1 so that my pregnancy doesn‚Äôt have any complications.
Under her extreme care I delivered baby boy in nov( as a full term baby).
Thank u Rashmi mam and entire Cloudnine Bellandur team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Rashmi ma‚Äôam in 2019 as I wasn‚Äôt able to conceive. I wasn‚Äôt aware of pcod,just by seeing me on video consultation she said I had marginal pcod and I was able to conceive within 2 months after consultation. I had suffered a  miscarriage in 2013 and was anxious because of previous loss, she gave me strength and ensured that I deliver successfully.Finding ma‚Äôam was pure grace as I had been praying all this while for divine to choose a doctor for me. I had synchronic haemotoma, chronic hypertension, cervix shortening, due to her expertise and timely detection of problems. I have my baby  in my arms. Two of my friends are also consulting her currently and are happy. If you are lucky to be in Bangalore do visit her without a second thought..she responds quickly to queries no matter how trivial they are..if I plan another baby ever, I m definitely going to consult her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had an amazing experience with Dr. Rashmi throughout my pregnancy. I loved her attitude of dealing with her patients with so much care and by being available over email and whatsapp for any additional queries post consultation. Though I had my labour pains at a very odd hour, she arrived on time and we had a very smooth delivery. I would highly recommend Dr Rashmi to everyone for an amazing pregnancy experience. The way she refers you by 'beta', it makes you feel at home. A big thanks to you ma'am for such a memorable journey. We will always be grateful to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
****** ****** ** **** *** ****** Due to covid situation I didn‚Äôt had my family members by myside throughout the pregnancy.. But due to the doctor i never felt the need of any. I was affected with covid at month 4. She managed that time so nicely via video consultation, that experience was just awesome. She was the only motivation for me and my husband at that time. She was just the replica of god for us at that time. Also I delivered little early at 35 weeks 4 days but my baby was completely healthy. All thanks to the doctor.
I would also highly recommend cloudnine. All the staff and the services are so homelike. Thanks to cloudnine too for making my journey smooth.
Thanks to Rashmi mam again for gifting me with a wonderful maternity journey.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: ** ***** ***** ** ****** ********* ** *** *** ** *** ** ****** ******* She helped me deliver a baby after 7 years of marriage. Me and my entire family is imdebted to her throughout our lives. She is an expert in high risk pregnancy with perfect management of problem and the patient. I became pregnant at advanced age i.e 41 yrs. We consulted with DR Rashmi at Cloudnine bellandur and she immediately made me take required tests, took care of me like my own mother, recommended procedures for the cervical length problens I had. She even got an expert in vaginal surgery to do a Shirodkar stitch which is done very rarely specially for my case. She made sure that I was taken care of in every possible way. Me and my family highly reccomend Dr Rashmi ** **** ****** for preganancy in bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Rashmi - Thank you for being the dedicated, thoughtful, and compassionate doctor that you are! You always go above and beyond and work tirelessly towards a healthy outcome. I won't forget bothering you every now and then for my concern sometimes serious sometimes silly. But never ever you discarded it rather explained me patiently. I was really struggling for so long but finally it happened and happened smoothly just because of you. I 'll be forever thankful to you for making this amazing thing happen in my life. I feel blessed to know you and have you as my doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted Dr Rashmi for my pregnancy journey and thanks to her that I am a mom to a beautiful girl today. Dr Rashmi was very patient throughout the journey, explained all the problems and process very well. She is full of positivity and that makes us, as a first time parent to be very confident and not nervous at all. I sincerely believe in trusting your doctor completely and Dr Rashmi took care of my delivery and post delivery so well. I fall short of words here to express how satisfied I am with her approach and patience. I am also grateful to her for removing my fibroid during my Caesarean section. She tried her best for a normal delivery but my body didn‚Äôt allow, she did what was best for me and my baby. If I ever plan a second baby, I know ‚Äúmy go to person‚Äù.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted Dr. Rashmi after reading so many positive reviews. I was having trouble with my periods for few months. Dr. suggested some tests and after analyzing the reports she explained me what exactly the problem is. She prescribed few medicines which I hardly took for a month and was able to conceive immediately. And I decided to stick with her throughout my pregnancy. What I like the most about her is her kind and approachable behavior, no matter how silly the doubt is, she will always explain it to you in detail. I would highly highly recommend her to anyone looking for a Gynecologist who is caring, ******* *** with Strong Work Ethics. You can even reach out to her on whatsapp and emails with your doubts. After my delivery she made sure to visit me everyday and asked me about my health. The level of comfort she provides made my pregnancy journey very smooth. Highly recommend her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We went to Cloudnine bellandur for my wife's treatment for PCOD and for pregnancy related.
We were so much lucky that we got to treat by Dr.Rashmi Choudary. She is an amazing doctor, her friendliness, care taking and professional behaviour, her patience towards listening to our health problems, explanation of the issue, proper medication what ever is just needed helped us a lot.
She took care of my wife's pregnancy period health and she helped us to deliver baby and it was a normal delivery. I recommend Dr.Rashmi Choudary.
From bottom of our heart, we are thankful to Dr.Rashmi Choudary and I would have given an additional star rating than 5 star rating for her.

Many thanks doctor for your treatment, help and support throughout. It really means a lot to us.

#RashmiChoudary#AmazingDoctor#Friendliness#Professional

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had got to know about Dr Rashmi Chaudhary  through Practo for an earlier consultation. Hence, we reached out to her when my wife's pregnancy tests came posutive. here's our experience with Dr Rashmi:1. Attitude: She patiently listens to the patient and responds calmly and clearly. There was a time during my wife's pregnancy when she was admitted to the hospital due to certain complications. Dr Rashminwas always there to support and showed care and concern when we were all worried.2. Practicality: In our experience with her so far, she was always looking at what was the best way  forward to handle the pregnancy and childbirth.3. Approachability: She was always there over WhatsApp or mails whenever we had doubts/ worries, which most parents have.Thanks to her practical and sensible approach, my wife had a normal delivery last week - and the baby and mother are both healthy and fine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****** ******** ** * ********* ************* I conceived at the age of 37 and had too many complications. First 3 months my consultation was at motherhood where I really had a bad experience. I got to know about Dr Rashmi chaudhry via Practo where I could see 99% positive comments. Based on the feedbacks wanted to visit her for my pregnancy check up. I am glad and happy that I found such a wonderful doctor.  She is very calm, friendly and explains you each and every thing in detail. I was scared all the time because of my late pregnancy but doctor ensured I don't get panic and stay positive. I am blessed with a healthy baby girl. I don't think I would have had such good experience with any other doctor. Thanks to you doctor for all the care and support rendered by you especially during the Covid situation. All nurse and hospital staff were really supportive. on the whole really had a good experience. Dr Rashmi and cloudnine rocksüôÇüôÇ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was recommended Dr. Rashmi Choudhary by a colleague in my third month of pregnancy and now having delivered a baby with her I would recommend her 100% to my friends and family. She is well experienced and very approachable - gives individual attention and is available on WhatsApp for adversities. She was very patient in all my consultations through out the pregnancy answering all doubts I had and providing proper treatment and medication at all times. She keeps the patient positive which helps one to be not afraid in pregnancy. Also she always gives timely treatment if she deems that there can be a complication- she suggested a planned C section for me due to few health issues - I had complete faith in her decision and she helped me deliver a healthy baby.

The doctor ****** *** ********* ** *** ***** ********* ****** *** was always looking at her phone. She hurried fast and wanted to get rid of the patient as she rushed outside after 2 mins. 
Didn‚Äôt answer anything about the doubts , concerns necessary precautions or why it happens . 
She just prescribed the medicines and ran away.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy with PCOD,Labor and Delivery,Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),
review:
Dr. Rashmi has the right experience, skill and attitude to take care of patients- both pre-pregnancy and during pregnancy.
It was such a confident journey for me with her being there. Be it starting my fertility treatment last Jan or doing HSG, she always took care and was strict when needed. She will not prescribe unnecessary medicines or tests.
Started my pregnancy with low lying placenta where she advised me to take care of certain things but not panic. This got resolved by second trimester. 
With short cervix diagnosed at 28 weeks, everything scared me apart from her assurance that we can carry full term which we did. She asked me till take test but no bed rest which helped me keep sane as wellüôèüèªüòä 
As the baby was breech, we had no option other than c-section. My baby boy was delivered via emergency c-section (doctor was well on time for delivery late night) and I was all the more confident as she was there.
Being available even during off duty hours via messages were so comforting. Highly recommended.

review: I visited her few months back to confirm my pregnancy. That was a start of a 9 month journey wherein she ensured best of care for me and the baby. My pregnancy was high risk due to multiple issues still she managed a full term baby due to her knowledge and experience. She also preffered for a normal delivery over csec and convinced to try for that. Overall I highly recommend her for gynae and obs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted Dr Rashmi for my pregnancy after going through her reviews, recommendations by fellow healthcare professionals and given her number of  years of experience. Dr Rashmi spends good time hearing patient doubts/problems and answers them very well which is the best assurance any patient longs for. Throughout my pregnancy she didn't recommend any unnecessary medication or test. While we thought of doing normal delivery but due to last minute complications had to undergo a emergency c section and Dr Rashmi reached the hospital in less than 20 mins in the wee hours and in other 10 mins my surgery was done. Very thankful to the Doctor for taking such prompt decision and actioning so swiftly in the nth minute.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is a great doctor. Also she will not give any extra scans,no extra medicine and tests. Under her treatment,I delivered my little princess last week. During my entire pregnancy I got a motherly feeling whenever i used to go for a checkup. My delivery happened in C-Section in the 39th week as cervix wasn't open until the last moment. The surgery was very smooth and I have almost fully recovered now within 10 days, thanks to Dr. Rashmi's expertise. I can still remember her words in OT "kya hua Moumita, Saab kuch achaa hoga" üòÉüòÉThank you so much Ma'am.Regards,Moumita & Kaniska

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I first started consulting Dr.Rashmi when I became pregnant in 2019. Unfortunately that pregnancy ended in miscarriage , since then till now ( July 2021) when I delivered a healthy baby girl Dr.Rashmi has been our guiding light . She ensured that we were counseled positively after the loss and guided us through successful conception . Even during the pregnancy , every appointment she dealt with us with atmost care , affection and positively. My water broke at midnight and was required to go through emergency c section , Doctor reached hospital in no time at 4am to deliver our baby.  We will be forever grateful to her and recommend to every expecting parent.Cloudnine facility was excellent too , during our 3 days of hospitalization all arrangements , doc visits , nurses support were managed perfectly.
